mapper.sql: ID, FREIGHT_TEMPLATE_ID, PROVINCE_IDS, TRANSFER_FLAG, COUNT_UNIT, CHARGE_UNIT, ADD_COUNT, ADD_CHARGE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from PMS_AREA_FREIGHT_TEMPLATE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PMS_AREA_FREIGHT_TEMPLATE (ID, FREIGHT_TEMPLATE_ID, PROVINCE_IDS, TRANSFER_FLAG, COUNT_UNIT, CHARGE_UNIT, ADD_COUNT, ADD_CHARGE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY )
(SELECT #{item.id, jdbcType = DECIMAL} AS ID, #{item.freightTemplateId, jdbcType = DECIMAL} AS FREIGHT_TEMPLATE_ID, #{item.provinceIds, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS PROVINCE_IDS, #{item.transferFlag, jdbcType = DECIMAL} AS TRANSFER_FLAG, #{item.countUnit, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS COUNT_UNIT, #{item.chargeUnit, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS CHARGE_UNIT, #{item.addCount, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS ADD_COUNT, #{item.addCharge, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS ADD_CHARGE, #{item.createTime, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} AS CREATE_TIME, #{item.updateTime, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} AS UPDATE_TIME, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS CREATED_BY, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AS UPDATED_BY FROM DUAL)

update.foreach:
